item.description:
After exploring city hall, what could be better than beer, food, trivia and a chance to win money?

Are you a night owl? Do you enjoy trivia? Come out and support fellow Newcomer, Ryan, as he hosts Trivia Night at Luxe Burger Bar!

First prize is a $30 in gift certificates to be used at a later date. This event starts at 9pm and goes until 11pm.

Let's meet at 8:45pm to see how many tables/teams we need. This place is usually busy!
item.how_to_find_us: ryan will be at the dj booth near the entrance; ask him where we are
item.name: Trivia @ Luxe Burger Bar (after I Heart Providence)
